name: Undead Invasion (itch) (JohnnyBoyle)
description:
Take over homes and buildings!

Infect armed humans!

Buy bigger and better zombies to help infect the world!

In this game you play as the zombie and the objective is to kill all the humans found in the city. When houses are taken over and humans are killed, you will be rewarded with "Brains". Use these brains to buy better zombies with unique abilities or purchase perks to help you in your quest to infect them all!

This game was made by a team of 5 people who you can check out in the games credits to see what they did!
